original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#fff999>$country1</color>勢力進行<color=#c0f5ff>親善</color>，與我方增加友好度<color=#bceea7>$num1點</color>，降低對方來攻的機會！
text: Enlightenment, your subordinates have sent people to <color=#c0f5ff>goodwill</color> to the <color=#fff999>$country1</color> forces, and increase friendship with us <color=#bceea7> $num1 point</color> to reduce the chance of the opponent coming to attack!
